page.title: 12Parish Magazine Extracts. 2
page.content: .....continued. class 1-"The Dingle Dangle Scarecrow", class 2-Preserving the Harvest,class 3 the harvest of the sea,class 4-the meaning of Harvest {Sunday December 23rd.-Christmas Carols {by Candlelight}in St.Ricarius Church. {April 1985. Auction Sale }in the Oriel Room for church funds.Auctioneer-Mr. David Stainton. {March 17th. 1985. Mothering Sunday {service } in church followed by refreshments in the Oriel Room. {May 18th.1985- coffee morning}at the Swan Hotel in aid of the Tuesday Club (senior citizens).Admission 20p.plus cake stall and raffle. {June 1985-}St.Ricarius Church Aberford {Arts and Crafts Fayre }in the church and church yard.Admission 10p. with proceeds to church funds. { }
